title: Mobile Mathematics Microlearning to Overcome STEM Entry Barriers

context.prior_knowledge: Basic Arithmetic Skills and Experience in Solving Everyday Problems
context.additional_context: Short-Term Course Designed to Reduce Cognitive Load in Smartphone-Based Learning Environments. Aims to Improve Conceptual Understanding and Learning Focus Through Pre-/Post-Quizzes

learning_goals: Learners can solve three types of real-life problems connected to mathematical concepts within one week.
Learners can recognize their learning gaps and establish targeted learning plans through pre-quizzes.
Learners can demonstrate an understanding of core concepts with an 80% or higher accuracy rate in post-quiz assessments.

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
